title: League of Legends and it's community is SOFT
body:
This whole, "I'm reporting you, you swore at me.", is fucking pathetic. I received ONE report and got banned 15 days. Only reason I ever get triggered is trolls. They troll, then I get mad at them because I'm stuck in a game for another 30 fucking minutes with a troll and a loss. YET I get reported. Like WTF?! "oh be the bigger man and carry and win." why should I have to get him a win. Trolls don't every get punished, unless they are toxic via communication. 

It is unbelievable that people are so soft, they report you after you say something anything remotely rude. Riot(League of Legends) and its Tribunal is pathetic. Oh and pings, dear lord. Trolls ping the shit out of you, driving you nuts with endless pings and no consequences.

yeah tell me about it, was only level 14... also those options must be in a recent update.
They've been around for like 5 months.
If you wish to have the community's opinion, post your *uneditied* chat logs.

I would love to, how may I do so. 

Also, not an excuse but chat logs do not show how the person I am "harassing" is acting. It will not show how they are trolling or mass spamming me.

I hope you know that "I'm reporting you, you swore at me" isnt a reportable offense. Swearing is fine. It when you use it as a tool for harassment when it becomes a problem. But that should be common sense. You wouldnt curse out a random person say at the store/market place for no reason right? These people you are playing with are random people. If they are making mistakes in the game, what makes you the right to tell them off? If anything they should be around the same skill level as that is what matchmaking is suppose to do!

All in all though we cant make legit discussion since you are choosing not to show us your chatlogs which proves you have something to hide!

Hmm  "soft  "

or a 

  negative verbally abusive uncivilized person with emotional and  anger management who  rages at people in a video game.

Hey  i have no problem with "soft "  if  I have to choose
Chat logs.

You may have used some of those words that get you instantly banned. That includes any hate speech and the infamous three words asking you to kill yourself. Well, if you used any of those to a simple troll you definitely deserved that punishment.
I never troll. Just curse when trolled. That is why this community is so ass. You get trolled then swear at the troll, and you get punished. It baffles me.
When it comes to their game, you play by their rules, sir.

Learn to accept you will not win every game. You cannot hard carry every game. Every game begins with a 50/50 chance of victory or loss. Everything you do after leaving base influences your chances of winning, including typing.

I fully understand not winning every game. That is not what I am bitching about. I am bitching about the trolls you get in your queue, or the immature kids who run it down mid. Then I cuss at them for wasting my time because I come to have fun. Then I AM the bad guy in the situation. When there is not trolls and people actually playing the game its very enjoyable, win or lose.
chat logs?
In such an environment it would seem to be best to say only those things which are not rude, sir.
